jobs.prompt: Action panel: ground-and-pound finish—Saiyan straddles and pins the massive horned basalt bull in churned sand, driving brutal hammerfists/elbows into jawline/neck while keeping the head turned. Collar arcing intense white-blue static at the throat, sweat and sand on skin, knuckles scraped. Rask’s eyes ruined/blinded but no gore; focus on impact, tension, and leverage. High-contrast comic-panel composition, crisp silhouettes, harsh rim light, dust motes in spotlights.

Close-up panel: kill-shock redline—Saiyan’s K-Chain shock collar erupts with thick white-blue arcs and sickly-gold circuit glow, jaw clenched, teeth bared, eyes narrowed. Foreground: Veyl’s gloved hand with remote, thumb depressing a control like a verdict. Ozone haze, harsh rim light, high contrast, no text.

Wide panel: intervention lands—red warning lights, guards surge onto the sand with electrified prods raised and a shock-net/cable rig unfurling. In the foreground, the Saiyan is half-lifted by the collar shock, forced to release; Rask lies heavy and still in churned sand, horns carved trenches. Background platform: Veyl above the gate, remote raised. Gritty sci-fi arena, dust/steam/ozone haze, cinematic framing, clear focal point, not gory.
